message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with natural image matting, which is a computer vision problem related to image segmentation and object extraction. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely category. The paper also discusses the use of affinities and their role in controlling the information flow, which suggests that it could be relevant to cs.GR (Graphics) and cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper also mentions the use of linear systems and closed-form solutions, which are common in cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning).
